name: Hungry Bob (JM)
description:
Bob is hungry! Help him to feed catching the desired fish. But be careful: He is very demanding and his preferences change very quickly.

Made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 127: Cats².

Controls:

 - Move:    WASD or Arrow keys

 - Jump:    W/Up/Space

 - Punch:    Q/E/F

Warning:

- May take some time to load the Web version. If it's taking too long, try some of the files to download.

- Still on the web version, if the game doesn't start in fullscreen press Enter.

- The MacOS and Linux versions have not been tested. Any reports would be appreciated.

- If problem downloading the files, try this link.

**   Graphics not final   **
